about_the_game:
Slide Ball Master is a new puzzle game with unique gameplay where you shoot bricks with your slingshot. With Carom's billiard-like gameplay, it's very important to calculate your shot. If you like billiards and hitting bricks, this game is for you!

FUN AND CHALLENGING BLOCKS

Does it seem easy to just hit the block? With so many different types of blocks, just hitting is not enough. For example, if you hit the red crossed blocks, the game is over!

HOW TO PLAY

Click and drag on the ​screen to form a trajectory. Release touch to shoot and slide the ball.


- 7 Chapters and 90 Levels
- Finish all levels and get Slide Ball Master achievement
detailed_description:
Slide Ball Master is a new puzzle game with unique gameplay where you shoot bricks with your slingshot. With Carom's billiard-like gameplay, it's very important to calculate your shot. If you like billiards and hitting bricks, this game is for you!

FUN AND CHALLENGING BLOCKS

Does it seem easy to just hit the block? With so many different types of blocks, just hitting is not enough. For example, if you hit the red crossed blocks, the game is over!

HOW TO PLAY

Click and drag on the ​screen to form a trajectory. Release touch to shoot and slide the ball.


- 7 Chapters and 90 Levels
- Finish all levels and get Slide Ball Master achievement
name: Slide Ball Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 1GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 1GB
